products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: N | DEG & MEG TANK > N1 | MEDIUM VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with wet pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic type.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: trim assembly: wet pilot, fitted with: strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, pressure switch, solenoid valve: flame proof 3/2 way, air filter regulator: included, manual release unit: included, type: electro-pneumatic

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: N | DEG & MEG TANK > N1 | MEDIUM VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: heavy, standard: IS 1239, fittings: threaded or grooved, included fittings: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to MS brackets/hangers, steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, application: above ground pipes, as per fire authorities requirement

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: N | DEG & MEG TANK > N1 | MEDIUM VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, standard: IS 1239 Part-1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reducers, clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats approved primer, two coats approved paint, joints: grooved with groove coupling, civil work: included

Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents. a | Capacity of 250 ltr.
